block.p: American League OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Agreed to terms with OF Ricky Ledee on a minor league contract.

National League CHICAGO CUBS--Agreed to terms with RHP Mark Prior on a one-year contract. MILWAUKEE BREWERS--Agreed to terms with RHP Jose Capellan, OF Drew Anderson, 2B Hernan Iribarren, RHP Mike Jones and LHP Manny Parra on one-year contracts. METS--Agreed to terms with OF Ruben Sierra on a minor league contract. Announced RHP Jason Standridge refused a minor league assignment and elected free agency.

MILWAUKEE BREWERS--Agreed to terms with RHP Jose Capellan, OF Drew Anderson, 2B Hernan Iribarren, RHP Mike Jones and LHP Manny Parra on one-year contracts. METS--Agreed to terms with OF Ruben Sierra on a minor league contract. Announced RHP Jason Standridge refused a minor league assignment and elected free agency.
